pages.text: $(li)The Campfire is a block that it can be used to cook food.$(br)$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Campfire.
$(li)Now, to fire it on, right click on the Campfire while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l) in your hand.
$(li)Finally just place your cookable food right clicking on the Campfire while you are holding it.
$(li)In a few seconds, the food will be cook and drop like an item into the ground.

$(li)You can place a Campfire down a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nest$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beehive)Beehive$(/l) to calm down angry $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bee)Bees$(/l).

$(li)Unlike the Furnaces, the Campfire doesn't need any kind of Fuel.$(br)$(li)Be careful, if you are on a Campfire, you will receive damage.$(br)$(li)You can turn off the Campfire, right clicking on them with a Water Bucket.$(br)$(li)There are other three different versions of the Campfire.
